title: The Queen in Scotland
creator_credit: Films of Scotland and Templar Film Studios
brief_description: A review of Royal visits to Scotland during 1960. Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II, and HRH Prince Philip touring the Western Isles, attending the Braemar Games, and Prince Andrew, Princess Ann and Prince Charles at Balmoral Castle. At Perth, Her Majesty inaugurates a road bridge, and at Kincardine she opens the new generating station. A visit to the Royal Highland Show precedes closing scenes in Edinburgh. Compiled by Riddell Black. Spoken by Tom Fleming.
